title: How to exist but not exist at the same time - Quora

response.answer_text: You can’t do both at the same time. But, you can and do vacillate between the two states of self awareness constantly (existence/nonexistence) as you move from one state of realization to the next. In other words you must give up one aspect of differentiation within realization to move on to the next aspect of differentiation within realization. It is the process of giving up the means to recognize the result of its own process that is akin to non-existence for consciousness.
